events.description: The announcement of Vietnam's retail sales performance for the month of January 2026.

facts.fact_text: Vietnam's retail sales increased by 9.3% year-on-year in January 2026.

evidences.evidence_text: Vietnam’s retail sales increased by 9.3% year-on-year in January 2026, easing from a 9.8% rise in the previous month.

facts.fact_text: Retail of goods accounts for 77% of overall retail sales in Vietnam.

evidences.evidence_text: retail of goods, accounting 77% of overall retail sales, grew by 9.3%, accelerating from an 8.6% rise in the prior period.

facts.fact_text: For the full year 2025, retail sales in Vietnam rose by 9.2% compared to 2024.

evidences.evidence_text: For the full year 2025, retail sales were up 9.2% compared with 2024.

claims.claim_text: Sales growth remained robust across all components despite a slower pace.

evidences.evidence_text: Sales growth remained robust across all components but on a slower pace compared to previous month.

claims.claim_text: Retail activity softened primarily in the services sectors.

evidences.evidence_text: Retail activity softened mostly for accommodation and food services (9.4% vs 14.2% in December 2025), travel and tourism (14% vs 19.9%), and other services (8.9% vs 12.7%).

evidence.evidence_text: Vietnam’s retail sales increased by 9.3% year-on-year in January 2026, easing from a 9.8% rise in the previous month.
retail of goods, accounting 77% of overall retail sales, grew by 9.3%
Retail activity softened mostly for... travel and tourism (14% vs 19.9%)
